name: Treasures Lightward: High Difficulty
introduction:
◆ Gameplay Rules ◆
● Treasures Lightward is a new series of permanent game modes with higher difficulty that refreshes periodically, including the Forgotten Hall: Memory of Chaos, Pure Fiction, Apocalyptic Shadow, and Anomaly Arbitration.
● After completing The Last Vestiges of Towering Citadel: Memory (XV), Forgotten Hall: Memory of Chaos will be unlocked.
● After completing the Adventure Mission "Youci's Clever Decor," Pure Fiction will be unlocked.
● After completing the Adventure Mission "Grim Film of Finality," Apocalyptic Shadow will be unlocked.
● After reaching Equilibrium Level 6, achieving a historical record of completing the highest stages with full stars in Forgotten Hall: Memory of Chaos, Pure Fiction, and Apocalyptic Shadow (these can be achieved across different versions), and have also completed the Adventure Mission "Knot-Tier Saga," Anomaly Arbitration will be unlocked.
● Treasures Lightward will periodically refresh the stage contents and rewards.

◆ Refresh Rules ◆
● Apocalyptic Shadow, Pure Fiction, and Forgotten Hall: Memory of Chaos will update alternatively every two weeks in the aforementioned order. Updates occur at 04:00 on Mondays (server time). After each update to a game mode, the updated mode will remain open for 6 weeks.
● Anomaly Arbitration will update alongside Version updates, and lasts until the end of each Version.
